page.title: 12BRONDEG HOUSE, SWANSEA
page.content: This unit provides special care for the physically handicapped. It has 20 residential places and 50 daycare places available for adults from 16 to 65. It is the only such unit run by West Glamorgan County Council and serves the whole of West Glamorgan. Its specially designed buildings offer unique residential and daycare opportunities, - activity rooms for a library, games, further education, craft, beauty therapy, cookery, music appreciation and drama offer facilities for both structured and informal groups. The unit is run by a caring body of social workers, resident staff and paramedical staff, with part-time help from the surrounding Manselton community and assistance from beauty therapists, chiropodists and others concerned with community health care.
